title: Music, FX and Ambient Bundle
description: This is a large pack of great music tracks, ambient tracks, sound effects and menu FX. NO ONE will ever mute your game's music....ever.
longDescription:
Here is a quick demo of a small fraction of the music and sound effects that you can expect to find in this pack.

youtube:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q47rBMjSfTQ

Demo:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/166rTq89BG-rCD0w0IW8ueegu-8ezsIsJ/view?usp=sharing


  • This is a very large collection of well made music tracks with a nice variety of styles and moods, awesome ambient tracks for all sorts of environments ( mostly creepy places) along with some nice atmospheric sound tracks like wind, blizzards, rain, forest ambience, storms ect... This pack also contains many sound effects for menu's and in-game UI. There is 259 total sound files.



This pack contains:

  • 75 music tracks
  • 30 thrills/impact sound effects
  • 11 explosion sound effects
  • 68 ambient sound tracks
  • 75 menu and in-game UI sound effects
